name: philodendron
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a climbing plant that is evergreen (= never loses its leaves) and is often grown indoors: She has made the room cosy by installing a couch, a fireplace, and a philodendron. Most types of philodendron will grow well in moist conditions.
More examplesFewer examplesPhilodendrons are popular as ornamental house plants.This variety of philodendron needs to have plenty of space to spread.A philodendron with big heart-shaped leaves was growing up a short pole.The ravine was full of tree-climbing philodendrons with huge leaves.
